title: Channel Integration API
description: schema for retailops webhook channel integrations

import_order_attrs.description: Note: is string the correct type for this property? also need an example

inv_suspended_mode.description: boolean? NOTE: example given was NULL

email_invoice.description: boolean? NOTE: example given was NULL

packages.description: Array of packages in this shipment

ship_items.description: Array of Items in This Shipment

item_giftwrap_amt.description: Amount paid for giftwrap, or amount of wrapped items???

item_shipping_tax_amt.description: Amount of tax charged? if so we need to change type to 'number' in order to support floats

item_subtotal_amt.description: Subtotal of order value? if so we need to change type to 'number' in order to support floats

item_shipping_amt.description: Cost of shipping? if so we need to change type to 'number' in order to support floats

item_giftwrap_tax_amt.description: Amount of tax for giftwrap? if so need to change type to 'number' in order to support floats

unshipped_items_ref.description: array of ID's unshipped items. Need to cjheck type of items in array (integers?)

from_counterparty_rate.description: Counterparty rate (boolean? if supposed to be $ value, change type to 'number')

by_account.description: Array of payment info by account

settled.description: number of payments settled or $ amount of payment that has been settled? if $ change type to 'number'

charged.description: Amount charged? if so change type to 'number' to support floats

is_failure.description: boolean success value represented as integer (0, 1)

request_url.description: request url for this service action

data_items.description: (key was originally named items, had to be changed to avoid schema conflict) What types are in the array?

additonal.description: additional information re: missing or invalid parameters

message.example: Missing or invalid parameter: PackagWeight.Unit Invalid unit of measurement specified try (lbs)

sellable.description: number of item in inventory that can be sold

writeback_request_item.description: line item in line_item array of writeback request

estimated_ship_date.description: estimated ship date in unix time

removed.description: TODO: check type, supplied example was 'NULL'

credit_item_refnum.description: ref number of returned item being credited

data.description: payload required by channel for feed catalog push. Must be defined by integrator (JSON)

refund_amt.description: amount refunded(?) or... items refund applied to(?)
